article_title: Obama's Manufacturing Hubs Mean Cronyism, Corporate Welfare And Less Innovation

article_metadata.description: It's an endless parade, one  top-down proposal after another from Washington. Having just presided over another 80,000 pages of regulations in the 2013 Federal Register, the launch (so called) of Obamacare, and five years of warfare against affordable energy, President Barack Obama presumes to reveal how government can spark innovation. Obama, you see, will now [...]
article_metadata.author: Clyde Wayne Crews Jr.
